name: NATIONAL SOLID WASTES MANAGEMENT ASSOCIATION v. Robert P. CASEY, Governor of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, and Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Department of Environmental Resources, Appellants
name_abbreviation: National Solid Wastes Management Ass'n v. Casey

judges: Before LARSEN, FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY and MONTEMURO, JJ.
NIX, C.J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: NATIONAL SOLID WASTES MANAGEMENT ASSOCIATION v. Robert P. CASEY, Governor of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, and Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Department of Environmental Resources, Appellants.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed.
NIX, C.J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Amy L. Putnam, Keith Welks, Harrisburg, for Governor, Com. of Pa. and Dept, of Environmental Resources.
William J. Winning, Robert E.J. Curran, Media, for National Solid Wastes Management Ass’n.
casebody.head_matter:
619 A.2d 1063
NATIONAL SOLID WASTES MANAGEMENT ASSOCIATION v. Robert P. CASEY, Governor of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, and Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Department of Environmental Resources, Appellants.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 28, 1993.
Decided Feb. 17, 1993.
Amy L. Putnam, Keith Welks, Harrisburg, for Governor, Com. of Pa. and Dept, of Environmental Resources.
William J. Winning, Robert E.J. Curran, Media, for National Solid Wastes Management Ass’n.
Before LARSEN, FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY and MONTEMURO, JJ.
